channel.title: Help!
channel.description: i'm trying to install a dirt old game, but it wont install. windows' website doesnt have ANY info on the game!!! can any1 help? the game is Descent: Freespace-- The Great War :'(

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: Samapico
item.description:
It’s a game with spaceshipz and laserz and explosiunz and other awsumz

Freespace 2: SCP is just the open-sourced official Freespace 2, modded by the community. And Freespace 2 is the sequel of Freespace: The Great War

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: Samapico
item.description:
Freespace 2 should work, though… check out the Freespace SCP (Source Code Project)
Basically a community-improved version of the game. A whole lot of improvements…

Read full topic

NOOOOO! now i have to press this button! it locked up again!

EDIT EDIT: lol, i pressed it 5 times at once
EDIT EDIT EDIT: STOP LOCKING UP U STUPID MACHINE!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: Samapico
item.description:
XP Mode is a virtual PC machine you can install on Windows 7. It works kind of like Remote Desktop Connection, if you ever used that… And the display you get when you connect to that virtual machine is not like if your video card was processing it, it’s emulated and (I think) software-rendered… So playing full screen games on that isn’t really an option.
(I could be wrong)

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: mralexs
item.description:
wait, what are you saying? i dont understand what you mean by “emulates a standard vga graphics card”
EDIT: nevar mind! the setup finally loaded! yay!
EDIT EDIT: crap, now it locked up
EDIT EDIT EDIT: yay! its loading again!

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: striker
item.description:
Win7 XP Mode won’t help here either, as it only emulates a standard vga graphics card. Maybe try some of the compatibility settings in the proprties tab of the installer. Are you using the x64 version by chance?

Sometimes there are problems with the safe/copylocks of the games, as there is no driver update for win7. But I don’t recon that’s the case for Freespace.

Read full topic

its win 7, and the setup wont load

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: SkyBlue
item.description:
If it’s not just an installation CD, try extracting the files from their directories on the CD yourself with WinRar/7zip etc, I’ve had to do this with a couple of really old games.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!

Yeah… we need more details… define “won’t install”, do you get any error?

Google led to this, but I can’t know if it’s related to your problem: https://www.ntcompatible.com/Freespace_The_Great_War_instaallation_problems-HELP_ME_PLEASE_t31879.html
